events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience in development.
A recruiter specializing in software development roles has been assigned to your application to guide you through the next steps.
Your initial screening interview went well. The recruiter was impressed with your knowledge of development tools and best practices.
Thank you for your prompt response. You confirmed your availability for the technical interview next week, which helps us proceed smoothly.
We have scheduled your technical interview for Thursday at 11 AM. Please prepare to discuss your experience with software engineering challenges.
